subject: Women
Deaths (Obituaries)
Newspapers
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: Ms. Garber began covering athletics in North Carolina more than 60 years ago, when female sportswriters were often regarded as a curiosity if not an imposition.
snippet: Ms. Garber began covering athletics in North Carolina more than 60 years ago, when female sportswriters were often regarded as a curiosity if not an imposition.
